      • createArea

        public void createArea(Area area,
                       Game g)
        Adds Objects to Area using 30x20 image
        Black = Brick
        Red = Koopa
        Green = Question Block
        Blue = Pipe
        Yellow = Ground
        Purple = FinishLine
        Parameters:
        area - The Area to add Objects to
        g - The instance of the Game

        y - The y coordinate where Mario will go
